rules_text:
When Escaped Ooze enters, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
{3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Escaped Ooze.
flavor_text: [i]The oozing of Estwald would stick with its residents for months to come.[/i]
